title: Owl - For comfortable reading
name: owl-comfortable-reading-addon
description:
An add-on to make online reading easy.
If you spend long hours in front of a computer screen, you likely have developed an aversion towards those glaring white backgrounds and harsh color combinations on websites.
This add-on transforms all webpages into a night-friendly mode, with dark background and dimmed colors.
author: Sidhant Sharma
